name: Profiterole Bop
description:
Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move, Up arrow key or Z to jump, X to attack or interact, P to pause, M to mute.

A very short, very simple hop and bop platformer I put together to try a few things out.

I wanted to keep this first project simple so for the most part it is, I probably went a bit overboard with the story and the weird little cutscenes though.

Downloadable versions of all of my games are now available for Windows here.

https://sigilcipher.itch.io/four-strange-games-by-sigil
